dict.acceptation: 民主的；民主政体的；民主主义的；<美>民主党的；

sent.orig: Seting up relation should have been at democratic election, democratic decision-makings, democratic managements and democratic supervision.
sent.trans: 建立民主化的党政关系应该从民主选举、民主决策、民主管理和民主监督这四个方面进行努力。

sent.orig: The democratic polity practices democratic politics, while the centralized polity can also practice democratic politics.
sent.trans: 民主政体实行民主政治，集权政体同样可以实现民主政治。

sent.orig: Villagers democratic management system building is the main content of China rural democratic management building.
sent.trans: 村民民主理财制度建设是中国农村民主管理制度建设的重要内容。

sent.orig: The president-elect is working with democratic Democratic leaders in Congress the economy an economic recovery plan.
sent.trans: 当选总统正在就一个经济恢复计划与国会的民主党领导人进行磋商。

sent.orig: There was not enough discussion nor democratic decision-making, let alone democratic supervision, " he said."
sent.trans: 既没有民主协商，又没有民主决策，更缺乏民主监督。
